column1: The Purple Pig////My party of 6 got sat down 15 minutes after we signed in
column2: and we were seated at the high top communal style table. It was pretty crammed
column3: but not going to complain since we barely had to wait. The waitress was very nice and talked us through the menu
column4: WHICH CHANGES TWICE DAILY (according to her anyway)!! So don't be surprised if you see something on Yelp that you want to try
